column1: Little Goat Diner////Let me first start off by thanking our waitress Christina. She was the perfect level of attentive. Not too much
column2: but not too little. She was very friendly and informative
column3: and seemed like she was able to hold down the section that she had (including us) very well. I am very picky when it comes to waitresses and she did VERY well. Â
